activities: We are a hotel auditing company that provides auditing services to corporations.  Upon completion of the PNR (Passenger Name Record) by a travel agency, they "queue (send) this information to us electronically and we verify that the lowest and most accurate rate was obtained within the corporate policy guidelines set by the corporation.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Hotel Solutions collects travel reservation data. All information is done electronically.
